Description: Granodiorite statue of Sekhmet, standing, with papyrus-staff before, base and arms missing or damaged.
Curator's comments: PM II (2): p.265 Des Dieux, des tombeaux, un savant. En Egypte sur les pas de Mariette Pacha (Boulogne catalogue 2004), 254.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2004 7 May-30 Aug, Boulogne, Château-Musée, Des dieux, des tombeaux, unsavant: En Egypt sur les pas de Mariette Pacha 2010/11 Oct-Mar, Leiden, National Museum Of Antiquities, Egyptian Magic 2011-13, Travelling Exhibition, Mummy: The Inside Story 19th Nov 2011- 11 Mar 2012. Richmond , VA, Virginia Museum of Fine Art. Mummy. The inside story. 2013 May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
